text: Best Of is a greatest hits album by Swedish rock band Kent. The album was released on September 16, 2016 by RCA Records and Sony Music.http://kent.nu/2016/08/24/best-of-16-september/ It features 20 previously released tracks and four new studio recordings. ==Track listing== == Charts == === Weekly charts === {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |} === Year-end charts === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Swedish Albums (Sverigetopplistan) | 55 |} == References == Category:2016 albums Category:Kent (band) albums Category:Swedish-language albums
title: Best Of (Kent album)
